price: 27਼ ਅਤੇ ਜਿਹੜੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਅਜ਼ਾਬ ਤੋਂ ਡਰਨ ਵਾਲੇ ਹਨ।
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
